For those having trouble, even though I haven't got this particular torrent....

1. Run BWASetup.exe and let it install
2. Find the Installation folder (C:\Program Files\Bookworm Adventures Deluxe)
3. Copy the BookwormAdventures.exe file that is in the fix folder to the installation folder.

@YuckS16 and everyone else who can't find the new torrent phithe uploaded...

#1 Turn off your anti-virus. It may detect and remove the crack as malware because it's supposed to. Uninstall any previous versions of BWA (use Revo not Windows).

#2 Run WinRar and extract all the files. Play a little Cypress Hill--you know you want to.

#3 Install game as normal. Uncheck 'Play BWA Now'.

#4 Before playing, go to the Fix folder and copy BookwormAdventures.exe, paste into your PopCap/BWA folder. (Overwriting the original file.)

#5 Get a glass of generic Kool-Aid, relax, have fun. (If you get stuck on Moxie's second mini game and have a 'p' word, try "pried"

This also works if you have a previously installed copy that had the time trial expire. (I know, I just did it.)

Thanks phithe for a fantastic download! You're a life saver!!!!!!!
